articles.description: A urine sample provided by Shohidul contained Clomifene, which is on the WADA's prohibited list
articles.content: The ICC said Shohidul accepted that he had "failed to satisfy the high levels of personal responsibility incumbent upon him as an international cricketer"  •  Walton

articles.author: Mohammad Isam
articles.title: Tamim credits Litton for 'brilliant call' to open with Shanto - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Bangladesh could test their bench strength in the final ODI, their captain has indicated
articles.content: Bangladesh, West Indies and their contrasting progress in ODIs

articles.author: Andrew Fidel Fernando
articles.title: SLC 'very confident' of hosting Asia Cup despite political crisis - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Sri Lanka recently hosted Australia, and Pakistan have recently arrived in the island nation for a Test series
articles.content: The Asia Cup Qualifier is due to run from August 20 to 26, and the main tournament from August 27 to September 11  •  Getty Images
